nodes.bodyText:
I think package.json is not needed. It just calls autorest-beta on exec. No dependency on nodejs.
And of course, one need to install @autorest/autorest before this script.

There were a comment nearby: "path.join won't work if specRoot is a URL", hence it uses '/'.
For now the dirty approach would need the spec on local filesystem to work. But still keep it this way. Some day we might no longer need this hacking and re-enable the URL.

const
If using const/let,  Try const always, then let if need change the target reference. Should not use var in the case.
